item.title: Make a game UI from 1 with pygame2!
item.description: # Overview This article is the 14th day of Future Advent Calendar 2019. Yesterday’s article was written by @RuyPKG I want to have fun even with newcomers! ~Preparation of minutes~. @Shibukawa introduced the game engine at an in-house study session the other day, which is the reason why this article was written. I wanted a UI for a board game implemented in Python, and it was difficult to express movement in HTML, so I decided to try pygame, the Python game engine.
